statements: SELECT * FROM field_mapping;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_type FROM field_mapping;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM field_mapping WHERE crop_health_status='good';
SELECT field_id FROM field_mapping WHERE crop_type='corn' ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_type FROM field_mapping WHERE longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM field_mapping WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND crop_health_status = 'Healthy' ORDER BY field_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM field_mapping WHERE crop_health_status IS NULL ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM field_mapping WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -85.0;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, crop_health_status FROM field_mapping WHERE crop_health_status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY crop_type ASC, field_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, AVG(longitude) AS avg_longitude FROM field_mapping WHERE crop_type = 'Wheat';
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM fields ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM fields WHERE field_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT field_name FROM fields WHERE field_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT health_status FROM crop_health;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM fields;
SELECT health_status, health_timestamp FROM crop_health WHERE field_id = '7e3bb2a0-76ca-4b98-bb5a-5a856a73b619';
SELECT * FROM fields JOIN crop_health ON fields.field_id = crop_health.field_id;
SELECT field_name, ST_AsText(field_location) as location FROM fields WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(field_location, ST_MakePoint(-122.3321, 47.6062)) < 1000;
SELECT field_name, health_status, health_timestamp FROM crop_health JOIN fields ON crop_health.field_id = fields.field_id WHERE health_status = 'healthy' ORDER BY health_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FieldMapping;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM FieldMapping WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT * FROM CropHealth ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT health_id, field_id, crop_type, health_status FROM CropHealth WHERE health_status = 'healthy';
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature), AVG(humidity) FROM SensorData;
SELECT * FROM FieldMapping ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM FieldMapping WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, health_status FROM FieldMapping JOIN CropHealth ON FieldMapping.field_id = CropHealth.field_id;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM SensorData WHERE field_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM FieldMapping;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude FROM FieldMapping ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_area FROM FieldMapping WHERE field_area > 1000;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude, field_area FROM FieldMapping WHERE latitude < 20 AND longitude > 30;
SELECT * FROM FieldMapping JOIN CropHealth ON FieldMapping.field_id = CropHealth.field_id;
SELECT * FROM FieldMapping ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude, field_area FROM FieldMapping WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;

SELECT fm.field_id, fh.health_status, fi.image_path, wd.temperature FROM FieldMapping fm JOIN CropHealth fh ON fm.field_id = fh.field_id JOIN FieldImages fi ON fm.field_id = fi.field_id JOIN WeatherData wd ON fm.field_id = wd.field_id WHERE fh.health_status = 'good';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE recorded_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT field_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM WeatherData GROUP BY field_id HAVING avg_temp > 25 AND avg_humidity < 70 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC , avg_humidity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Field
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field WHERE location_lat > 0
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment ORDER BY field_id DESC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit'
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, hire_date FROM Worker
SELECT * FROM Field WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field WHERE location_lat > 40.0;
SELECT Crop.crop_id, Crop.crop_name, Health_Reading.reading_date FROM Crop JOIN Health_Reading ON Crop.crop_id = Health_Reading.crop_id;
SELECT Worker.worker_name, Worker.hire_date, Equipment.equipment_name FROM Worker JOIN Equipment ON Worker.worker_id = Equipment.field_id;
SELECT Field.field_id, Field.field_name, Equipment.equipment_type FROM Field LEFT JOIN Equipment ON Field.field_id = Equipment.field_id;
